about.title: ABOUT
about.description: Software developer, 23 years old, with experience since 2021 in various projects and companies. Currently working as a Full Stack developer focusing on TypeScript, NodeJS, NextJS (ReactJS), Java, Go, Docker, databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and cloud services like AWS and GCP.
about.stacks: TypeScript, NodeJS, NextJS (ReactJS), Go, Docker, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and AWS
